name: Marius
description: This VR experience is good choice for all who want to see a great artificial cartoon-style environment in VR. The library beams you into new world where Marius, the librarian, lives between a really disorganized magic library. It’s the first demo of the newly founded VR Studio “Granola Studios”.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX1070 Storage: 2 GB available space
